title: Sugar cane prices should be linked Siddharth Shriram
text:
Sugar & cane prices should be linked: Siddharth Shriram 
Business Standard Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Even after the partial decontrol of sugar about two years ago, mills continue to be under pressure. Mills are forced to pay a high price for sugarcane to farmers and a series of measures taken by the government is not helping. Mawana Sugars promoter...
